title: 149 - Shark Tank Elevator Pitches
description: On today's show, all the guys are back together in studio where they discuss some of the new things they've been watching on Netflix, Mitt gives an update on his apartment situation, Connor recalls how he and Zito almost died in an Uber accident in Tampa, and they get into a Pod FOD that ranges from airlines deciding to weigh passengers before letting them get on flights (to which Mitt has some despicable things to say to Zito), what animals most American's think they could kill, a convenience store robbery gone wrong, an Olympic athlete taking heat for a picture she decided to post on Instagram, and much more. Don't forget to subscribe to the Youtube Channel, and submit your questions or comments to the Pod FOD at @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, we'll see you Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
